descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/modimages/BANNURWINTER.png[/img]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img]


PLEASE SEND ME PICTURES OF MY WARPAINT, would help tremendously!

[size=4][size=6][color=#a4c2f4][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84054/?]FEMALE WINTERHEART WARPAINT[/url][/size][/color][/size][/size]

[color=#c27ba0][b][size=3]
[color=#ffffff][size=6][ PLEASE READ: ][/size][/color]

Warpaint for Nord, Breton, Imperial and Redguard ,
Sorry no mer at this time :-(

The rest coming soon...[/size][/b][/color]

[size=4][color=#ffd966][b][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=2]Using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/][b]RACE MENU[/b][/url] by [b]Expired[/b] will help tremendously with utilizing the layering of these warpaints. It is not necessary, but it is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED![/size][/color][size=2]
[/size][color=#ffffff][size=3][size=2][i][u][b]AND FOR THE WARPAINTS TO LOOK LIKE THEY DO IN THE IMAGES[/b][/u][/i]:[/size]
[size=2]You should use [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE 1.6.16[/url]. Thanks to a [u][b].ini[/b][/u] setting added to [i]SKSE[/i], it is now possible to use HD (2048x2048) warpaint applied to your
character rather than being limited to the vanilla resolution (256x256).
To allow this you [u][b]MUST[/b][/u] have [i]SKSE[/i] installed and you should add these lines to your [i]SKSE.ini[/i]:

[b][Display]
iTintTextureResolution=2048[/b][/size][/size][/color]
______________________________________

HOW TO INSTALL:[/size][/b][/color]

[b]MANUAL:[/b]
Simply open the .zip file, drag and drop the Data file into your Skyrim folder
and overwrite if needed. You can also copy and paste the single file you
wish to use in the Tintmasks folder.
(Data/texture/actors/character/character assets/tintmasks).

VIA NMM:
Just click the " Download NMM" [u]recommended
[/u]And use LOOT, always use it.
[u]
[size=4][color=#ffd966][b][size=5]______________________________________
[/size][/b][/color][/size][/u][/size]

[size=4][color=#ffe599][color=#e06666][b][size=5]UNINSTALL:[/size][/b][/color]
[/color][/size][size=4]Delete the files in the Tintmasks folder to return to the vanilla warpaint or overwrite with
your own or other warpaints if you so choose.

[size=4][color=#ffd966][b][size=5]______________________________________
[/size][/b][/color][/size]
[color=#ffe599][size=5]PERMISSION:[/size][/color]

You are allowed to use my warpaints for any follower or mod, but full credit must be given to me.
DO NOT SELL MY MOD OR ITEMS IN MY MOD.

[size=4][size=4][color=#ffd966][b][size=5]______________________________________
[/size][/b][/color][/size][/size]

[size=6][color=#6aa84f]OTHER MODS BY ME:[/color][/size][/size][size=4][size=6][color=#a4c2f4][size=4]
Gift of Lamia[/size][/color][/size][/size][size=4][size=6][color=#a4c2f4][size=4]
[/size][/color][/size][/size][/center][size=4][center]Eyes of Valentina

[size=2]
[/size]Better males[/center][/size][center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/b][/url][/b][/center]
